alfredsnippet.snippet:
Gerrit L. Verschuur, Interstellar Neutral Hydrogen Filaments at High Galactic Latitudes and the Bennett Pinch, Astrophysics and Space Science, 227:197, 1995

"The role of large-scale currents may be far more important in defining interstellar structure than has generally been recognized within the astronomical community."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Role of Large-Scale Currents in Defining Interstellar Structure
